epay_standard.label: ePay | Payment Solutions 2.8.1
epay_standard.comment: Detailed description of these settings are to be found on www.magentoguiden.dk.

active.label: Enabled:
active.comment: To enable and disable this payment method.

title.label: Title:
title.comment: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

order_status.label: Order status (Before the payment is made):
order_status.comment: Set the status of the order before the payment is made. This is used to distinguish between paid and not paid orders!

order_status_after_payment.label: New order status (When the payment is made):
order_status_after_payment.comment: Set the status of the order after the payment is made. This is used to distinguish between paid and not paid orders!

use_auto_cancel.label: Use Auto-Cancel:
use_auto_cancel.comment: If enabled this will auto-cancel orders where no payment has been made in the time interval: from 1 day ago until 1 hour ago. Notice! For this to work you must setup cronjobs for your Magento installation. Contact your hosting provider for assistance on how to do so.

sort_order.label: Sort order:
sort_order.comment: In which order this payment method is displayed to the customer.

allowspecific.label: Payment from applicable countries:
allowspecific.comment: If you need to define from which countries this payment method is available.

specificcountry.label: Payment from Specific countries:
specificcountry.comment: Define from which countries this payment method is available if the setting above is set to "Specific Countries".

merchantnumber.label: Merchantnumber:
merchantnumber.comment: The unique merchantnumber received from the payment system. If you don't know your merchantnumber please log into your account here. You can then find your merchantnumber from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

windowid.label: Window ID:
windowid.comment: Defines the window to use. You can find the available windows on your account here. Go to the menu Settings -> Payment window.

instantcapture.label: Instant capture:
instantcapture.comment: This is used if you wish to capture the payments at the same time as it is authorized. This option may only be used if the cardholder receives the goods at once.

instantinvoice.label: Instant invoice:
instantinvoice.comment: This is used if you wish to create an invoice once the payment has been authorized. Notice that this will also try to capture the payment

instantinvoicemail.label: Instant invoice mail:
instantinvoicemail.comment: If instant invoice then send invoice to customer.

md5key.label: MD5 Key:
md5key.comment: This is the secret password you must enter both here and within the payment system if you enable MD5 above. Notice that the secret password must be 100% the same. Otherwise the customer will be declined as payments are made. You can log into your account on the payment system here. The MD5 settings are to be found from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

authmail.label: Auth Mail:
authmail.comment: The auth mail setting is used if you need to receive an e-mail with payment information from the payment system as the payment is made. If you have multiple receivers you can separate the list by semicolon (;).

windowstate.label: Windows state:
windowstate.comment: If the value is Overlay the Payment Window will open as a overlay window on top of the store. If the value is Full Screen the payment window will be displayed in the same window but in full-screen.

ownreceipt.label: Use own receipt:
ownreceipt.comment: If this option is enabled the customer will be redirected instantly to the Magento accept-page on approved authorization.

addfeetoshipping.label: Add payment fee to order
addfeetoshipping.comment: If the customer pays for the payment surcharge the amount will not be displayed on the order confirmation. The surcharge is displayed on the order, invoice and creditmemo totals

sendmailorderconfirmation.label: Send Email Order Confirmation:
sendmailorderconfirmation.comment: Enabling this setting will result in an order confirmation is e-mailed to the customer as the payment is made.

remoteinterface.label: Process payments from within the order administration of Magento:
remoteinterface.comment:
Enable this option in order to capture, credit and delete payments directly from the Magento administration on the order page. You then don't need to enter the administration area of the payment system in order to process payments.

Important information when processing the payments from Magento:
- When an order is canceled or voided the payment is deleted within the payment system.
- When an invoice is created the payment can be captured from the bottom of the invoice.
- When a credit memo is created the payment can be credited back to the customer from the bottom of the credit memo.

remoteinterfacepassword.label: Remote password:
remoteinterfacepassword.comment: If payments is processed from within the order administration and a password is added in the ePay administration is should also be added here.

captureinvoicemail.label: Capture invoice mail:
captureinvoicemail.comment: When bulk capture then send invoice mail to customer.

enableinvoicedata.label: Enable invoice data:
enableinvoicedata.comment: Collect invoice data and send to the payment window

enablemobilepaymentwindow.label: Enable Mobile Payment Window:
enablemobilepaymentwindow.comment: When using a mobile device use the mobile payment window

cancelonedit.label: Cancel the payment when order is edited
cancelonedit.comment: If enabled this will cancel the payment (default Magento behavior) when an order is edited. Notice! If you turn off this feature, you will have to manualy handle the payment in the epay administration!
